All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, AopInfrastructureBean, BeanClassLoaderAware, BeanFactoryAware, BeanPostProcessor, InstantiationAwareBeanPostProcessor, Ordered
Direct Known Subclasses:
SetOnceClassLoaderBeanNameAutoProxyCreator
public class CurrentClassLoaderBeanNameAutoProxyCreator
extends BeanNameAutoProxyCreator

This sets the ClassLoader for the BeanNameAutoProxyCreator to the current one that this class exists in
Compatible with Spring 1.2.8+

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski@gmail.com)
